SEARCH
Package Models

Class CardBombTest

java.lang.Object
Models.CardBombTest
public class CardBombTest extends Object
The type Card bomb test. This class contains unit tests to verify the functionality of the CardBomb order in the game. It tests the validity of the CardBomb order and its execution when applied to a country.
Author:
Taksh Rana

  • Field Details

    • d_currentState

      CurrentState d_currentState
      The D current state. The current state of the game, including the players, map, and other game-related information.

    • d_cardBombOrder

      CardBomb d_cardBombOrder
      The D card bomb order. The instance of the CardBomb order for the valid case.

    • d_cardBombOrder1

      Card d_cardBombOrder1
      The D card bomb order 1. The instance of the CardBomb order for the invalid case.

      Player d_player1
      The D player 1. The first player involved in the game.

      Player d_player2
      The D player 2. The second player involved in the game.

    • l_map

      Map l_map
      The L map. The map containing all countries and their relations (adjacency and armies).

  • Constructor Details

    • CardBombTest

      public CardBombTest()

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Sets up the game environment for testing. This method initializes the game state, players, countries, and map, and assigns the CardBomb orders.

    • executeCardBomb

      public void executeCardBomb()
      Execute card bomb. This test case checks the execution of the CardBomb order. It verifies that the number of armies in the bombed country is correctly updated after the CardBomb order is executed.

    • validOrderCheckCardBomb

      public void validOrderCheckCardBomb()
      Valid order check card bomb. This test case checks the validity of the CardBomb order. It verifies if the CardBomb order is valid for a country owned by the enemy (India) and invalid for a country owned by the player (USA).
